name: Lab. -1
description:
NOTE BEFORE YOU PLAY: The game has no menu, as well as no way to pause. So, once you start the game, you better be ready.  :)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS: (They are written on the game, but still...)

- Arrow Keys/WASD: Move

- X/Spacebar: Jump

- Z/E: Interact

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREDITS:

- NPCs & Tileset: 0x72 aka Robert (https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-robot-tileset)

- Boxes & Some Other Textures: GrafxKid (https://opengameart.org/content/items-and-elements)

- Some SFX: Jonas, from the WOWIE Asset Pack (https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack)

- All the rest: Marxy 37 aka Me

- You: For Playing (^u^)
